verbs.description: [V: is] buying a house a better investment than the stock market we did the math and the answer is clear whether real estate is a better investment than the stock market is an ongoing debate owning a home is often the biggest financial commitment someone will make while investing in stocks is generally a key component of building wealth we compared the two over the past three decades stock federal housing finance agency yahoo us investment
